TextView.android:text: 1)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n Explanation:- Parsley, basil, and dill are types of herbs.\n Mayonnaise is not an herb.
2)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n Explanation:-An ounce measures weight; the other choices measure length.
3)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n Explanation :- Tyre, steering wheel, and engine are all parts of a car.
4)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n Tulip, rose, and daisy are all types of flowers. A bud is not.
5)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer

Answer : Option A 
 Explanation: Loaf, sourdough, and pumpernickel are types of bread.
 A rye is not a bread type. 
 Loaf - Bread that is shaped and baked in one piece and usually sliced before being eaten. 
 Pumpernickel - Dark, dense German bread made from coarsely ground whole-grain rye. 
 Sourdough - Leaven for making bread, consisting of fermenting dough, typically that left over from a previous batch 
 Rye - A wheatlike cereal plant that tolerates poor soils and low temperatures.
6)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n Explanation: The wing, fin, and rudder are all parts of an airplane.
7)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n Explanation:The core, seeds, and pulp are all parts of an apple.\n A slice would be a piece taken out of an apple.
8)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n Explanation: A peninsula, island, and cape are all landforms; a bay is a body of water.
9)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n Explanation:Fair, just, and equitable are all synonyms meaning impartial.\n Favorable means expressing approval.
10)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n Explanation: Unique, rare, and exceptional are all synonyms. Beautiful has a different meaning.
11)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option A \n The yarn, twine, and cord are all used for tying. The tape is not used in the same way.
12)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n A leopard, cougar, and lion all belong to the cat family; an elephant does not.
13)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n The couch, table, and chair are pieces of furniture; the rug is not.
14)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n The cornea, retina, and pupil are all parts of the eye.
15)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n The noun, preposition, and adverb are classes of words that make up a sentence. Punctuation belongs in a sentence, but punctuation is not a class of word.
16)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option A \n An index, glossary, and chapter are all parts of a book. Choice a does not belong because the book is the whole, not a part.
17)Which word does NOT belong with the others?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n The first three choices are all synonyms.
